body:
Hey guys, League crashed in the middle of an ARAM game for everyone, when we joined back it was all fine. after the game though, my friend and I Have the "Please Reconnect to the Game" screen open. We've tried connecting to the game, logging on and off and changing firewall properties. can anyone help? Also, when we try connecting the screen goes black and gives us a fire wall error.

Update: League seems to have fixed itself after two hours of waiting, still really annoying. Also the game isn't showing up in match history.

replies.body: Yeah check my post is that what you're getting too?
Close, but we actually finished the game. we won and clicked the continue and everything.
I lolnexus'd just then, game is still up for some reason?
I can't reconnect or do anything for some reason, so I'm stuck here doing absolute jack. LoLNexus my game and see how long it's been going for.
Jesus, 1hour game... hopefully riot fixes this soon, because its just frustrating sitting here not able to do anything...

Extra information - NPNGAlex and his friend got me to try and spectate the game. After the loading screen came up and put everyone on 100% it just sat there doing nothing. After a while it gave me an error about the data server being unable to load the game, and kicked me to the end game screen, with the title being "Red team victory".
